titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building located at 10 Causeway Street in Boston, Massachusetts, as the "Thomas P. O'Neill Jr. Federal Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

bill.summary: 4/30/1987--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located on Causeway Street, Boston, Massachusetts, as the Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., Federal Building.
